attributes.action: Make it illegal for schools to insist on specific branded or logoed uniform.
attributes.additional_details: The cost of uniforms is spiralling out of control. In a time of Austerity and increasing debt families are having to go without food or heating to cover the cost of uniforms. This is not a choice families should have to make.  Uniform compliance has become more important to schools than actual learning.
attributes.background: Branded uniforms are expensive and unaffordable to many. Generic uniforms are cheap when bought from supermarkets.
